entry.title: New Replacement Battery For iPhone 12 & iPhone 12 Pro
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 31.99

You have a Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can swell inside and damage the internals.

Our Batteries for Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Apple batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • 100% New with premium components
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro

Warranty

The Replacement Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Apple Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Battery 2815 mAh
Compatible Model Apple iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 Pro
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: New Replacement Battery Compatible For iPhone SE 2020
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 25.99

You have an iPhone SE 2020 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your iPhone SE 2020 shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new iPhone SE 2020 replacement battery.

The battery in your iPhone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

 

Our batteries are produced with the same quality standard as original Apple iPhone batteries. The iPhone SE 2020 replacement battery power is rated at 1821 mAh (6.97 Wh).

After this easy battery repair, it will have the same battery health as when your iPhone 8 was new.

The battery life will last long enough for up 14 hours of talk time.

 

  • Zero cycle count
  • UN38.3, MSDS, ROHS, CE Certification
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • Less than 20 minutes to replace
  • Adhesive strips are included
  • 1-Year Warranty

 

Compatibility

This lithium ion battery battery is only compatible with an iPhone SE 2020.

 

Warranty

The Replacement iPhone SE 2020 Battery comes with 1-year warranty, as with all the other iPhone battery Replacement Parts. For any assistance with installation or questions with your product please don’t hesitate to contact our support team. Don’t forget to power off your iPhone before attempting the repair.

 

Part Type Battery For iPhone
Compatible Model iPhone SE 2020 (4.7")
Model Number A2275 A2296 A2298
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

You can replace your broken Apple iPhone 12 & 12 Pro screen using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, Our Apple parts have you covered.
